ygData.subject: Re: Anyone wanna play with me?
ygData.msgSnippet: OK, ok-- i get the Pink Floyd thing going on there-- that s cool-- but I m lost on the whole Buddy thing. Enquiring minds want to know!!! Since you read
ygData.messageBody:
OK, ok-- i get the Pink Floyd thing going on
there-- that's cool-- but I'm lost on the whole Buddy
thing. Enquiring minds want to know!!!<br><br>Since you
read ALL the posts (good reading, eh?), you probably
already know that I play on the Xev server-- My main used
to be my gnome mage, but I've found myself drawn to
the life of a wood elf druid, and he is now my avatar
on norrath. <br><br>Please feel free to admit the
extent of your addiction here. I have been so busy at
work, that i've actually not played for a few days. (I
KNOW!!! can you believe that????). But my guild is
hosting a lower level raid in the Warrens tonight, and
i'll be supervising-- so that should be fun!!
<br><br>Xela
